patterns: What should be my ideal diet to stay healthy?
What will be my ideal diet?
How can I stay healthy?
responses: Healthy eating means consuming the right portions (Quantity) of foods from all food groups to lead a healthy life.
We need a wide range of nutrients to lead a healthy and an active life style.
The requirement of nutrient keeps changing in different phase of life.
more of proteins containing the essential food groups and nutrients - vitamin A, C, calcium, iron and zinc.
A Healthy good diet should be fitting in your nutritional lifestyle and not lifestyle fitting in diet.

patterns: Do you take credit cards?
Do you accept Mastercard?
Can I pay with Paypal?
Are you cash only?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: How many doctors and / or provider?
How many Doctors are availabe?
How many doctors are there?
responses: Currently there are more than 70 providers at five Health Care locations.
Total of 70 providers include Doctors,Nurse Practitioners, Physician Assistants, Dentists and Hygienists.

patterns: How can I make an appointment?
How can we make appointment?
What is needed to make an appointment?
responses: Call (253) 722-2161 for general medical or dental information or to make a medical appointment.
Call (253) 722-2151 for general dental or medical information or to make a dental appointment.

patterns: Do people choose their doctor?
Can I choose doctor?
May I able to choose the doctor?
responses: Yes, people choose their doctor or dentist. Our providers offer a wide range of abilities and experiences.
yes!Patients can choose which doctor or dentist is right for them.

patterns: What if a patient needs a nursing home?
What if I need a nursing home?
Can i get a nursing home with your help?
Can i get a nursing home?
responses: Our Outreach Staff works with the patient to find an affordable nursing home.For this you have to contact at (25) 657-525-50 .

patterns: How do i access the Patient Portal?
How can I access my Patient portal?
How can i see my patient portal?
responses: Set a user name and password to access your patient portal.
Enter your user name and password in YourChart to sign up.
If you have problems accessing the patient portal call or email to Our Health Care’s department during business hours at (25) 727-521-10 .
You can self-enroll in the Patient Portal by using yuor password and ID.

patterns: Is COVID-19 worse than flu?
is covid-19 worse than anything?
is covid_19 better than anyother flu?
responses: COVID-19 has a higher rate of severe disease and mortality in nearly every age group, compared with influenza (flu).

patterns: what are the symptoms of COVID-19?
what type of symptoms covid-19 has?
how will i know if i have covid?
responses: The most common symptoms of COVID-19 are:Fever,Dry cough,Fatigue,Loss of taste or smell,Nasal congestion,Sore throat,Headache
If you have symptoms of Loss of taste or smell,Nasal congestion,Fever,Dry cough,Sore throat,Headache then probably you have covid.

patterns: When should i get tested for Covid-19?
when is the right time to get tested for covid-19?
responses: Anyone with symptoms should be tested, wherever possible.
People who do have symptoms or not but have had close contact with someone who is or may be infected may also consider testing
If you have covid symptoms contact your local health guidelines and follow their guidance or get tested.

patterns: Are there long-term effect of covid-19?
what are the after effect of covid-19
after covid what kind of effect will be there?
responses: Some people who have had COVID-19 whether they have needed hospitalization or not continue to experience symptoms,including fatigue,respiratory and neurological symptoms.

patterns: How long does covid-19 take to develop symptoms?
how many days covid-19 take to develop symptoms?
After how many days covid-19 develops its symptoms?
responses: The time from exposure to COVID-19 to the moment when symptoms begin is, on average, 5-6 days and can range from 1-14 days.
Normally 5-6 days to range fom 1-14 days and advised to remain at home and stay away from others for 14 days.
It takes 1-14 days and keep distance from others in order to prevent the spread of the virus.

patterns: what should i do if i have covid symptoms?
what is the first thing to do if i have covid symptoms?
What will i do if i have covid?
what should i do if i doubt having symptoms of covid-19?
what if i have covid-19?
responses: If you have any symptoms of COVID-19, call your health care provider or COVID-19 hotline and find out when and where to get a test stay at home for 14 days.
If you have symptoms then contact doctor and get youself testes as soon as possible and maintain distance from others.
If you have shortness of breath or pain or pressure in the chest, seek medical attention at a health facility immediately.
Call your health care provider or hotline in advance for direction to the right health facility.
